text: 9.13 Wkp 16.3, 16.14-16, Nam 19.9, 19.17-19, Hib 10.4 Chɨn nopun, binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨl asɨŋ mɨdebal okok, kɨli apel, bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok kɨli chag meme chag bulmakaw pakɨl nɨkɨm ak dɨpal. Nɨkɨm dɨl, chag bulmakaw neb malep ak mab dagɨlel pɨsnep yɨn bɨj tɨkak bad ogɨnap dɨl, yɨnɨgak bɨj kab ak sek nɨkɨm ak sek binɨb wak kɨlop okok askoy pakñɨbal. Kɨlop anɨgɨl pakñel, binɨb okok kɨli asɨŋ ma mɨdɨl God binɨb suŋtep ne yɨbɨl mɨdebal.
